description.displayText: Melissa was our full-time nanny for 4 years. She started when our youngest son M was only 3 mos old and our oldest son was almost 3 years old. We love her dearly and any family would be lucky to have her! Melissa is kind, loving, empathetic, genuine, and extremely responsible and dependable. We were always confident that our children were in the best of hands with her. When M was a baby, she read, talked with him, sang, got down on the floor and played with him, took him to the park, playground, and activities, and did laundry/cooking/clean up/baths.  She helped with drop off/pickup when he started school and cared for both kids during vacations and sick days. When COVID hit, Melissa was a true partner, helping us juggle childcare, online/hybrid learning, different pick up/drop offs, and the kids' days off as we worked from home. Her calm, steady, warm demeanor was invaluable to us. The kids adore her! We highly recommend Melissa without reservations. Please reach out with any questions.

description.displayText: Melissa is so loving and sweet. She is trustworthy and reliable. You can feel at ease knowing your children are loved and well taken care of.
description.originalText: Melissa is so loving and sweet. She is trustworthy and reliable. You can feel at ease knowing your children are loved and well taken care of.

description.displayText:
Melissa worked for us from February 2016 until January 2018. She took care of my son, S, from the time he was two months old, until he went to daycare at age two. Melissa is caring, easygoing, flexible with schedule changes, and leaves the house looking neater than when she got there. Even better, she's an experienced nursery teacher who set S on the path to lifelong learning. Many other families in our building commented to me how great she was after seeing her out and about with S, and several of our friends hired her for babysitting as well. She loves
pets and is easy to talk to. I can't imagine a better nanny!

description.displayText: Melissa has cared for our son for the past year and we are so sad to be losing her (we are moving out of the area). Melissa is kind, loving, fun, responsible and incredibly knowledgeable about babies and kids. When our son was with Melissa, we knew he was in good hands - safe, loved and always having a blast (and probably laughing, too). Every morning when Melissa arrived, he would run to give her a hug. As a parent, there is no better feeling than knowing your child is both safe and happy. One thing that really stands out about Melissa is that she approaches kids with a genuine desire to understand what makes them unique and therefore how to best care for them as individuals. It's awesome to watch her observe and understand the small things about our son's personality that make him, him. We were so lucky to have met Melissa and the next family to work with her is hitting the jackpot!
